resources.string: "\"... who, in novels of great emotional force, has uncovered the abyss beneath our illusory sense of connection with the world.\" \n\n With a citation as such, the Nobel Prize for Literature in 2017 has been awarded to which stellar writer?
The author of the 2017 book \"Sleeping Beauties\" hasn\'t written which of the following?
114 individuals have been awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature so far. How many of them have been women?
Who won the Pulitzer for fiction in 2015?
Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality is a fan-fiction series for the original Harry Potter by JK Rowling. Written under the pen name Less Wrong, who is the actual author?
